Dialogue.Page: Oh, uh, hey, it's me, Ernesto the magic talking anglerfish.
I guess I'm supposed to give you a tour of the planet or something, so, yeah, let's do that.
So, first off, this is the party shack, there's a bunch of modders inside that you can chat with if you want. It's pretty neat.
... Yeah, that's pretty much all there is to that, so I'm gonna say we should move on. Follow me, or don't, but I'm going to the equator.
